title: Building The Ultimate iPhone XS
description: The Apple iPhone XS Max gets the "ultimate" build treatment. Check out the Marshall Kilburn II!  Building The Ultimate Xbox One X:   3POD Phone Tripod Thing on Amazon:  Smartphone Filmmaking Starter Kit on Amazon:  Beastgrip DOF Canon EF Smartphone Lens Adapter on Amazon:  Beastgrip Universal Smartphone Rig on Amazon:  Apatronix iPhone XS Max Wireless Charging Battery Bank Case on Amazon:  MOMAX Qi Wireless Charging Battery Bank on Amazon:  AirPower-ish Apple Watch + iPhone Qi Wireless Charger on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
